question:
####[Null Signal](https://nullsignal.games) [Downfall Release Notes](https://nullsignal.games/products/Downfall/DFReleaseNotes#QandAforDownfall) [Null Signal Rules Team]
If The Class Act is uninstalled during the turn the Runner installed it, do they still draw 4 cards?
answer:
No.

Which comes first, The Class Act’s first ability or discarding to hand size?

text_ruling:
How does [Verbal Plasticity](en/card/30034) interact with [The Class Act](/en/card/26018)?
>[Verbal Plasticity](en/card/30034)’s ability resolves immediately after the Runner pays the cost to take the basic action to draw 1 card, before the actual draw becomes imminent. [The Class Act](/en/card/26018)’s second ability resolves later, during the interrupt window that occurs while the draw effect is imminent. If both abilities are applicable, the Runner will look at 3 cards and put 1 of those cards on the bottom of their stack, then draw the other 2.
